modName: Ganon and The Miniblins from Wind Waker
summary: A project that a friend of mine and I came up with!  Ganon and his Miniblins from Wind Waker.  All resources are completely fan-made, no ported assets.
descriptionHtml:
A project that a friend of mine and I came up with! Ganon and his Miniblins from Wind Waker. All resources are completely fan-made, no ported assets.

Out in the middle of the Ocean near Dawnstar is a tower jutting out from the sea...go up it and fight the legendary Ganon. He is no push over. Unless you force push him over. But I wouldn't recommend that, since it takes out all the fun! He's level 100 and conjures an army of Miniblins so he's quite a challenge for any player, but I have faith in you that you can do it.

He drops unique loot and also a tome that lets you conjure his Miniblins for yourself, I recommend using conjuration mods with it otherwise you'll only summon two at a time...they're way more fun in a group.
author: Buffscale McThundertail and Haishao
